title: Workspace: Root docs
description: Adds docs describing how to build/test/run in a multi-project repo using Settings.

with.text:
# Workspace

This repo contains multiple projects.

## Layout
- apps/: applications
- libs/: shared libraries

## Build/Test/Run
Use your environment Settings to select how each ecosystem builds/tests/runs.

## Adding a new project
Use the 'Monorepo: Add App or Library' pack and choose ecosystem/profile.
